programme.title: Making of 'Straight Outta Compton'
programme.desc: A look at "Straight Outta Compton," a 2015 drama that chronicles the history of the hip-hop group NWA in 1980s California. The film stars Jason Mitchell, Corey Hawkins, O'Shea Jackson Jr., Aldis Hodge and Neil Brown Jr., and is directed by F. Gary Gray(n)

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Entrenched in the racial tumult of Los Angeles in the mid-1980's, a group of aspiring rappers banded together to revolutionize the global consumption of hip-hop and popular culture. NWA was born out of racial frustration and the disadvantaged economics of their South Central neighborhood. F. Gary Gray directs this biopic about the rise to stardom for the act that earned the moniker of "The World's Most Dangerous Group", featuring Ice Cube's son O'Shea Jackson Jr. playing the role of his father, Corey Hawkins as Dr. Dre, and Jason Mitchell as the late Eazy-E(n)

programme.title: Broadcast News
programme.desc: A feisty television producer is torn between an ambitious yet dim anchorman and her closest confidant, a cynical veteran reporter(n)

programme.title: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
programme.desc: Sean Connery stars in this all-action adventure as Allan Quatermain, called out of retirement in Kenya to help the government avert a world war being fomented by master criminal The Phantom. Quatermain gathers together a top team, including Dorian Gray, Captain Nemo, Mina Harker and The Invisible Man, each with their spectacular skill. From Venice to the wastes of Mongolia, the team face perils and death in their desperate race against time. Stephen Norrington's fantasy, set in an alternative VIctorian world, is frantic fun-filled action from start to finish, with the witty script matching awesome special effects. Edited for violence and language(n)

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger woos and transports a young woman to a crumbling dwelling atop a clay mountain, where she soon learns he has many secrets in the haunted mansion that will leave her fighting for her sanity and her very life(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour 3
programme.desc: In this slick, slam-bang sequel mismatched cops head to Paris to unravel a plot by Triad gangs to assassinate a Chinese diplomat(n)

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Two down-on-their-luck pals become arms dealers, but get in over their heads when they land a $300 million contract with the U.S. government to supply weaponry to forces in Afghanistan. This raucous comedy-drama is based on true events(n)

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Teen-angst comedy drama about five school kids - an athlete, a spoiled rich kid, a brainy nerd, an introverted loner and a rebellious punk - who are brought together on a day-long detention. Despite their original hostilities, and a psychotic teacher, the motley crew break the rules, bare their souls and find they have more in common than just attending the same high school(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Sam Witwicky wants his life back. After saving the universe of destruction in a battle between two warring races of robotic aliens, he wants to study at the University and spend the last moments before leaving with his girlfriend Mikaela. But avoiding his fate is not going to be an easy task to fulfill because an ambitious man of the government will put the world again in danger and start another round of the war between good and evil. programme.desc: A look at the U.S. armed forces' ban on gays and lesbians includes remarks from activists, politicians, and active and former service members; and a timeline of the contentious process leading up to the repeal of Don't Ask, Don't Tell, which takes effect on Sept. 20, 2011, and allows homosexuals to serve openly for the first time. programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Years after the events of The Bourne Ultimatum, former CIA assassin Jason Bourne (Matt Damon) resurfaces just as his former employers are implementing a new program aimed at hunting him down. Now fully recovered from his amnesia, Bourne teams up with Nicky Parsons (Julia Stiles) to uncover the truth behind his father's death, while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail. Paul Greengrass returns to helm this sequel, which co-stars Tommy Lee Jones, Alicia Vikander, Riz Ahmed, and Vincent Cassel(n)

programme.title: Boiler Room

programme.title: Making of 'Straight Outta Compton'
programme.desc: A look at "Straight Outta Compton," a 2015 drama that chronicles the history of the hip-hop group NWA in 1980s California. The film stars Jason Mitchell, Corey Hawkins, O'Shea Jackson Jr., Aldis Hodge and Neil Brown Jr., and is directed by F. Gary Gray(n)

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Entrenched in the racial tumult of Los Angeles in the mid-1980's, a group of aspiring rappers banded together to revolutionize the global consumption of hip-hop and popular culture. NWA was born out of racial frustration and the disadvantaged economics of their South Central neighborhood. F. Gary Gray directs this biopic about the rise to stardom for the act that earned the moniker of "The World's Most Dangerous Group", featuring Ice Cube's son O'Shea Jackson Jr. playing the role of his father, Corey Hawkins as Dr. Dre, and Jason Mitchell as the late Eazy-E(n)

programme.title: Broadcast News
programme.desc: A feisty television producer is torn between an ambitious yet dim anchorman and her closest confidant, a cynical veteran reporter(n)

programme.title: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
programme.desc: Sean Connery stars in this all-action adventure as Allan Quatermain, called out of retirement in Kenya to help the government avert a world war being fomented by master criminal The Phantom. Quatermain gathers together a top team, including Dorian Gray, Captain Nemo, Mina Harker and The Invisible Man, each with their spectacular skill. From Venice to the wastes of Mongolia, the team face perils and death in their desperate race against time. Stephen Norrington's fantasy, set in an alternative VIctorian world, is frantic fun-filled action from start to finish, with the witty script matching awesome special effects. Edited for violence and language(n)

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger woos and transports a young woman to a crumbling dwelling atop a clay mountain, where she soon learns he has many secrets in the haunted mansion that will leave her fighting for her sanity and her very life(n)

programme.title: Grumpier Old Men
programme.desc: 1995. Odd couple Jack Lemmon and Walter Matthau are reunited for this curmudgeonly comedy sequel. Two Italian women plan to turn the old guys' bait shop into a restaurant. Dir: Lorant Deutch(n)

programme.title: The Man with Two Brains
programme.desc: Zany horror spoof about a talented brain surgeon trapped in marriage to a malicious wife whose affections are shared with everyone but her husband. A serial elevator killer is on the loose, and the good doctor finds himself in love with the disembodied brain of one of the killer's victims. All he needs is a body to put it in(n)

programme.title: Mafia!
programme.desc: Satirist Jim Arahams returned with this comedy spoofing the Godfather trilogy, and other films and TV, including Jurassic Park, Lord of the Dance, and Barney. The opening emulates a Saul Bass sequence with Anthony Cortino (Jay Mohr) in a flight amid flames much like Robert De Niro in the Casino credits. After flashbacks go back in time to Sicily, Coppola/Scorsese references abound. Young Vincenzo (Jason Fuchs) travels to America to later become the clumsy chief of organized crime (with the late Lloyd Bridges as the aging Vincenzo) with his sons -- short-fused Joey (Billy Burke) and educated Anthony. Tony's WASP fiancee is Diane (Christina Applegate), recalling Diane Keaton in the Coppola films. During the wedding, assassins try to do away with Don Vincenzo, who's hospitalized, so Tony sets out to gain revenge for the murder attempt. In Vegas, Tony gets involved with showgirl Pepper (Pamela Gidley). When betrayals begin, can violence be far behind? This was Lloyd Bridges' final movie, and the film is dedicated to him(n)

programme.desc: CIA agent Alex Scott is teamed with an unlikely partner for a secret mission in Budapest to recover a superplane: loud-mouthed boxing champ Kelly Robinson. Spy comedy(n)

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Slinky space queen Serleena plots extra-terrestrial destruction and Agent J is going to need help. The only one who knows Serleena's secret is K, who's now a postal official with no knowledge of his former life. Can J persuade a reluctant K to put on the black suit for more alien-busting? Sci-fi comedy(n)

programme.title: The Good Guy
programme.desc: After executive producing the acclaimed documentary Manda Bala and the J.M. Coetzee adaptation Disgrace, Julio DePietro makes his feature debut as a writer-director with The Good Guy, a drama about ambitious young Wall Streeters fighting each other -- and sometimes their own decent nature -- to get ahead in the world. Our narrator, Tommy (Scott Porter of TV's Friday Night Lights), is young, clever, charming, and attractive. He's got a smart, pretty girlfriend, Beth (Alexis Bledel of Gilmore Girls), an urban conservationist. He's also very good at his investment broker job, impressing his ruthless, cynical boss, Cash (erstwhile "Brat Pack" member Andrew McCarthy). When a key member of Tommy's sales team suddenly leaves for a competitor, Tommy needs to fill his spot quickly, and takes a chance on the bumbling Daniel (Bryan Greenberg, Bride Wars), a former Marine and computer geek who seems a bit naïve about high finance and a bit nervous around women. Tommy takes Daniel under his wing, showing him how to dress, where to socialize, and how to charm attractive women. Their relationship is threatened when Daniel begins spending more time with Beth, joining her book club, and becoming her confidant. Tommy begins to question his decision to share his wisdom with Daniel, while Daniel is forced to decide what success really means to him, and where his loyalties lie. The Good Guy also stars Anna Chlumsky (In the Loop) and Aaron Yoo (Disturbia). The film had its world premiere at the 2009 Tribeca Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: Gag-meister Jerry Zucker's cracking comedy has a cast to die for. Las Vegas casino owner Donald P Sinclair decides to set up a special event for his highest rollers. Lucky tokens in his slot machines entitle six punters to enter a race across America with $2million as the prize. He'll make a killing on the bets placed on the players while the contestants dash for the cash(n)

programme.desc: More madness and fun in this second part of the successful film that portrayed the obsessions and troubles of a thirty-year-old woman searching for the perfect man. This time, Brigdet (Renée Zellweger) seems to have found him in the discreet Mark Darcy (Colin Firth), but during a wild trip she meets up again with Daniel Cleaver (Hugh Grant), a former lover of hers, which builds up the confusion in her life, helped by Jones¿s jealousy of her boyfriend's slender girl friend(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie'
programme.desc: A look at "Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie," a 2016 adaptation of the popular British sitcom about hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy, who flee to the French Riviera after they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party. The film stars Jennifer Saunders and Joanna Lumley, and is directed by Mandie Fletcher(n)

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: Whoopi Goldberg stars in Emile Ardolino's comedy thriller as Deloris Van Cartier, a lounge singer at a casino managed by her lover Vince LaRocca. He's also a drugs baron and when she accidentally interrupts him in the process of rubbing out a stool pigeon, she has to run for her life. To keep her safe until LaRocca can be charged, the police arrange for her to become Sister Mary Clarence at a nunnery overseen by stern Mother Superior. But you can't keep a good singer down and Sister Mary has soon so successfully invigorated the choir with her musical talent that the church is packed - and there is even a call from Rome for a Papal performance. Unfortunately, thanks to an inside man in the police department, LaRocca learns of her whereabouts and sets out to prevent her testifying; can her new found friends, the nuns, protect her?(n)

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love
programme.desc: Oscar-winning romantic comedy about William Shakespeare and his fictional relationship with a beautiful young woman. 'Will' has hit a dry patch, creatively speaking, although he has an idea for a new play - 'Romeo and Ethel the Pirate's Daughter'. However, it is not until the beautiful Viola de Lesseps enters his life that he receives a boost. As Will sets about wooing her, his creative juices start to flow, fortunately for those who depend on his writing to make their living! This Tom Stoppard-scripted film won a handful of Oscars including Best Picture and boasts an all-star cast(n)

programme.desc: Bumbling saber-toothed squirrel Scrat continues to cause mischief in outer space, where he sets off a series of events that send an asteroid hurtling toward Earth. Soon, Manny the woolly mammoth (voiced by Ray Romano), Sid the sloth (John Leguizamo), and Diego the saber-toothed tiger (Denis Leary) embark on a journey with their rambunctious animal friends to prevent the asteroid from ending life as they know it. programme.title: Dr. Seuss' Horton Hears a Who!
programme.desc: (2008) Jimmy Hayward and Steve Martino's animated family film, based on Dr Seuss' book, stars Horton (voiced by Jim Carrey), a elephant. One day, wandering through the jungle, he hears a voice coming from a mote of dust. It turns out to be the tiny planet of the Whos, who are threatened with destruction. Horton agrees to help them and, catching them safely on a flower, seeks the help of the others in the jungle. But the Kangaroo, ruler of the jungle, believes, "If you can't see it, it's not there" and hires the vulture Vlad to eliminate the planet. Can Horton save the Whos? With Steve Carrell as the voice of the Mayor of Whoville, and Isla Fisher as a Who doctor, Mary Lou Larue(n)

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Stuart must protect a bird from the clutches of the evil Falcon in this sequel(n)

programme.title: The Music In Me: A Family Special
programme.desc: Profiles of young musicians from different musical and cultural traditions(n)

programme.title: The Electric Company
programme.desc: No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child

Voices...Turkey Lurkey: Alan M. Dershowitz. Lucy Goosey: Mary Hart. Foxy Woxy: Johnnie L. Cochran Jr. Merle: Geraldine A. Ferraro. Earl: Rudy Giuliani. Wooster Rooster: John McLaughlin. Ducky Daddles: Henry A. Kissinger. Cocky Locky: Rev. Jesse L. Jackson(n)

programme.title: Camp Nowhere
programme.desc: Rebellious teens faced with a boring summer at camp enlist a teacher to trick their parents and create a fantasy getaway(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
programme.desc: Bumbling saber-toothed squirrel Scrat continues to cause mischief in outer space, where he sets off a series of events that send an asteroid hurtling toward Earth. Soon, Manny the woolly mammoth (voiced by Ray Romano), Sid the sloth (John Leguizamo), and Diego the saber-toothed tiger (Denis Leary) embark on a journey with their rambunctious animal friends to prevent the asteroid from ending life as they know it. Simon Pegg, Queen Latifah, Adam DeVine, Nick Offerman, and Jennifer Lopez also lend their voices to this animated sequel(n)

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Slinky space queen Serleena plots extra-terrestrial destruction and Agent J is going to need help. The only one who knows Serleena's secret is K, who's now a postal official with no knowledge of his former life. Can J persuade a reluctant K to put on the black suit for more alien-busting? Sci-fi comedy(n)

programme.title: Batman & Robin
programme.desc: New troubles have arisen in Gotham City. First, there's new super villain in town: Mr. Freeze a former doctor whose blood is laced with cryogenic liquid, causing him to be cold in look and feeling who plans to freeze Gotham until he gets the money needed to finish finding the cure for a mysterious disease that has stricken his wife. Second, Poison Ivy a villainess with luscious lips full of venom, has arrived in Gotham with her hulking servant, Bane, with plans to team up with Freeze and prepare the way for genetically enhanced plants. Third, Ivy has caused a rift between the partnership of the Dark Knight and the Boy Wonder. And finally, Alfred Batman's trusted butler, has developed the same disease that Freeze's wife has. It is in this time of need that a new partner, Batgirl steps forward to help the two rid the city of evil once more(n)

programme.title: Batman Forever
programme.desc: The Caped Crusader and his new partner Robin do battle with DA Harvey Dent and vengeful scientist The Riddler(n)

programme.title: They Live
programme.desc: Piper and David are two blue-collar construction men who discover a sinister plot of aliens taking over Earth by looking like us and feeding us subliminal messages. No one believes them but they go in packing heat anyways. Stupid film but fun anyways(n)

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: When a misjudged prank against an old man goes disastrously wrong, four Hell's Kitchen youths are sentenced to a year in reform school in upstate New York. There, the friends are changed by brutal beatings and humiliating abuse from the very guards sworn to protect them. Years later, when two of the youths are charged with the murder of one of their old tormentors, the horrible events of their past are revived. But, with one of the four friends serving as prosecutor on the case, the real villains may finally be brought to justice(n)

programme.title: Next Friday
programme.desc: Ice Cube returns as South Central L.A. slacker Craig Jones for this raucous sequel to 1995's "Friday." Jones hightails it to his lottery-winning uncle's suburban crib to hide from an escaped con he helped put in jail in the first film. Tom "Tiny" Lister Jr., Mike Epps, John Witherspoon(n)

programme.title: Friday
programme.desc: A typical day in the life of Craig, an alright guy with some crazy friends. Like Smokey, who has 24 hours to pay back Deebo, South Central's nastiest thug - or else. Trouble is, neither Craig's mother nor his main squeeze have the cash. As time ticks away, the chance this pair will ever see Saturday is fading fast(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: Alice leads a team of commandos into the multi-national Umbrella Corporation's locked-down bunker, which is controlled by the main computer, The Red Queen. The unit is sealed because of a virus that gassed all the staff but, as Alice and her team discover, the virus has re-animated them. Now, as well as facing the computer's weaponry, they must tackle the living dead to prevent the virus escaping into the outside world. Paul W Anderson's horror thriller is based on the successful computer game(n)

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: The Visit is a comedic horror film from director M. Night Shyamalan that follows a pair of children whose lives are changed drastically when their mother (Kathryn Hahn) takes them to visit their grandparents. After seeing their grandparents engaged in activities that they had been kept as a secret to the entire family previously, they are endangered and rendered potentially unable to ever return to their previous existence. The movie co-stars Peter McRobbie and Deanna Dunagan, with music from Hans Zimmer(n)

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: (2001) Action tale adapted from the popular video game in which the eponymous heroine races against time to find an ancient relic before it falls into the wrong hands. Leaving behind her life of luxury, the highly-trained adventurer travels to exotic and dangerous locales, where she battles a variety of fantastical creatures in the knowledge that the fate of mankind rests in her hands(n)

programme.title: Major Payne
programme.desc: Comedy about a born fighter who is thrown out of the army and winds up training a group of junior cadets. Major Payne (Damon Wayans) is ejected from the army after his commanding officer advises him that he has killed everyone and that there is no one left to fight. In desperation, the fearsome Payne finds a civilian job teaching combat skills to a mixed bunch of kids at a private school - and the results are hilarious!(n)

programme.title: Criminal
programme.desc: Espionage thriller about a prisoner who is implanted with a deceased CIA agent's memories in an attempt to thwart a deadly plot(n)

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: 1992 blockbuster starring Whitney Houston and Kevin Costner - as a singer superstar and her bodyguard who fall in love. Houston hires Costner when she starts receiving death threats from a stalker. The ex-presidential bodyguard has a past, however. He is wracked by guilt over his inability to protect Reagan from John Hinckley's assassination attempt. He's certainly not going to let a bullet slip past himagain and the draconian security measures he sets up are a shock to Houston. But Costner proves his worth when, in the face of death threats, the singer gives the performance of her life at the Oscar ceremony. Houston brings the house down with her performance of the Dolly Parton song 'I Will Always Love You'(n)

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: In Joel Schumacher's taut thriller, told in real time, cynical, smarmy PR man Stu Shepard picks up a ringing phone in a booth in a busy New York street to find a killer on the line. Armed with a high-powered sniper's rifle, the anonymous caller soon proves his prowess and presents Shepard with a choice: convince the police of his story before they shoot him or drop the phone and be shot. His only hope lies in self-abasement and facing up to the truths of his life(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: Alice leads a team of commandos into the multi-national Umbrella Corporation's locked-down bunker, which is controlled by the main computer, The Red Queen. With the help of two of his friends (Christopher Meyer and Christopher Jordan Wallace), he decides to embark on an adventure through inner-city Oakland to retrieve them. programme.desc: Samuel L Jackson plays a pharmaceutical genius who has used his knowledge to make a fortune in illegal drugs, particularly with Formula 51, which is more potent than heroin, crack or anything else. But instead of selling it to his drug lord employer (Meatloaf), he jets to Liverpool where Robert Carlyle is acting as broker for Ricky Tomlinson, who's prepared to offer $20m for the formula - money Jackson would love to spend if he can stay alive long enough in Ronny Yu's fast-moving crime thriller(n)

programme.desc: A true story. It is January 1, 1923 in Rosewood, but in this largely black town built on family, faith and hard work, hopes for the New Year abruptly end. In a few harrowing nights, a white mob razes Rosewood into oblivion. As the rampage gains cataclysmic force, a heroic World War I veteran and a shopkeeper join forces. Dozens of terrified women and children have fled into nearby swamps. Somehow they must be led to safety(n)

programme.title: Joe Kidd
programme.desc: Tracker Joe Kidd is hired by vengeful rancher Harlan to lead his hunters to a Mexican bandit. But when Kidd sees Harlan's viciousness in action, he switches sides. Western famous for the scene in which Clint drives a train through a town(n)

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: This feel-good ensemble comedy tracks a quartet of suburban siblings and their families over the course of a single summer. Hardworking Gil Buckman (Steve Martin) and his stay-at-home wife, Karen (Mary Steeenburgen), have just a few months to help their oldest son, Kevin (Jasen Fisher), overcome his high-strung behavior problems before he'll be relegated to special-education classes. Gil's difficult relationship with his own father, Frank (Jason Robards), has led him to become a would-be super-dad for his three kids, so he takes his son's difficulties more than a little personally. Gil's sister, Helen (Dianne Wiest), is trying to raise a moody, adolescent son (Leaf Phoenix) and an independent-minded daughter (Martha Plimpton) with no help from her well-off ex-husband, who's more interested in his new wife and family. Gil and Helen's sister, Susan (Harley Jane Kozak), meanwhile, must participate in the too-scripted Big Life Plans of her anal-retentive husband, Nathan (Rick Moranis), whose overachiever zeal infects even their toddler daughter. When long-lost brother Larry (Tom Hulce) show up with yet another get-rich-quick scheme, he brings with him a surprise addition to the family. Screenwriters Babaloo Mandel, Lowell Ganz, and Ron Howard negotiate their varied subplots with a deftness and comedic touch that transforms this conflicted clan into a suburban everyfamily(n)

Corey conoce a un hombre interesado en venderles el primer sistema de audio casero, una Fonógrafo Edison de 1901. Rick examina varias piezas de pequeñas esculturas demoníacas hechas en oro sólido pero, para su sorpresa, están pintadas de negro. ¿Valdrán su peso en oro?(n)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: You Snooze, You Lose. Todos están en posición de combate mientras Rick examina una espada para dos manos de origen alemán, elaborada a comienzos del siglo XVII. ¿Ejecutará una maniobra perfecta por esta arma antigua o el trato se quedará en el aire? Más adelante Corey se sube al montículo con un juego de barajitas de béisbol de 1933 que llega a la tienda. ¿La sacará de jonrón o quedará fuera del juego? Y después, los bulliciosos vecinos de Corey no lo dejan dormir en la noche. ¿Encontrará un lugar tranquilo para dormir o se convertirá en la peor pesadilla de la tienda?(n)

programme.title: Revenge of the Nerds
programme.desc: Gilbert and Lewis embark on their freshman year at Adams College, little do they realize the perils that await them. They're beset with taunting by the jocks of Alpha Beta fraternity, which only worsens when the jocks accidentally burn down their house and are forced toss the freshmen out of the freshmen dorm. To make matters more problematic, Lewis develops a crush on pretty Betty Childs, popular sorority sister and quarterback's girlfriend. Joined by the aptly named Booger and the violin-playing Pointdexter, the nerds soon realize they must form their own fraternity in self-defense. Soon the tables are turned as the nerds employ high-tech warfare against the jocks.. but can they really win and make a difference?(n)

Sarah Polley and Ving Rhames star as two of the last remaining people on an earth that has been ravaged by flesh-eating zombies. After escaping to a shopping mall with a handful of other survivors, they decide that they only way to truly elude the approaching throng of undead is to somehow make their way to an island that is supposedly zombie-free. As a last resort, he teams up with a pair of crooks, Showalter (Steve Buscemi) and Grimsrud (Peter Stormare), to kidnap his wife and demand an $80,000 ransom from her wealthy father. programme.title: Killer Women with Piers Morgan
programme.desc: The broadcaster meets Florida woman Jennifer Mee who, as a teenager, became a media sensation when she suffered a particularly strange ailment - a persistent case of hiccups. But in 2010, she lured an innocent man to a dark alleyway where her friends were waiting to rob him. Instead he ended up being shot dead. Even though she didn't pull the trigger, and was nowhere near when the bullets were fired, Jennifer was sentenced to life without parole. Piers charts the journey through fame and rejection that saw Jennifer descend into a criminal lifestyle, and asks family members and legal experts if they believe her punishment was too harsh.(n)

programme.desc: Janet comes face to face with the man who left her fighting for life just months earlier - serial killer Geoff Hastings, who has vowed to finally reveal the full extent of his crimes. Crime drama, starring Lesley Sharp and Suranne Jones, with an appearance by Kevin Doyle (Downton Abbey's Molesley).(n)

programme.title: Scott & Bailey

programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team embark on a dig at Athelney in Somerset, the fortress hiding place of King Alfred the Great, from where he went on to defeat the Danes at the Battle of Ethandun in May 878.(n)

programme.title: Car SOS
programme.desc: Tim, Fuzz and the team must race against the clock when they step in and restore high end car, a 1967 Lancia Flavia coupe, that has been hidden in a garage in Rochdale for 30 years.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Noel tries to fix a cocker spaniel's leg problems by fitting two bionic back feet, before launching a series of investigations into what is causing a cat to drag its leg. Plus, a Westie puppy with a fractured knee arrives, but it cannot keep still.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Pioneering veterinarian Noel Fitzpatrick plans to use groundbreaking cell technology to repair damaged cartilage in a 10-month-old golden retriever that helps a five-year-old girl cope with epilepsy. A cat arrives at the surgery with a suspected rat bite that seems to be getting bigger, and a whippet is brought in after being hit by a car - sustaining multiple pelvic fractures.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud follows the progress of architectural designer Lincoln Miles and his wife, artist Lisa Traxler, who want to create their own home on the Isle of Wight. They have bought a property on a prime piece of land and set out to convert it into a creative structure that harmonises with the unspoilt woodland setting.(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Claire is brought to castle Leoch, and is introduced to the Laird. The nurse does her best to make friends and bides her time as a tinker may be passing by soon, but Dougal is keeping a close eye on her - and insists she stays and puts her healing skills to good use.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: The staff at King's College Hospital treat patients on Valentine's Day, including a 53-year-old psychologist who has injured his shoulder in a motorcycle accident. His partner is abroad and he doesn't want to worry her, so he decides to keep the incident a secret. Also in the A&E department are a man with a bleed on the brain and an elderly widower who has been bitten by his dog.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Abby has had an accident at a diving pool and needs to have her head and neck scanned for serious injuries. Worried mum Nikki puts on a brave face while doctors perform tests, but dad Scott is stuck hundreds of miles away in Scotland. Meanwhile, Anne and Holton - part of a security team dealing with more than 50 incidents a month - encounter a variety of challenging patients on the night shift at King's College Hospital in London.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Fiery chef Gordon Ramsay comes to the aid of a mother-and-son team who have gone through 20 chefs in two years at their struggling Italian restaurant in California. The adjoining bar is a triumph, but the oldest dining establishment in town needs an overhaul if the inexperienced owners are to make a profit.(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Claire is brought to castle Leoch, and is introduced to the Laird. The nurse does her best to make friends and bides her time as a tinker may be passing by soon, but Dougal is keeping a close eye on her - and insists she stays and puts her healing skills to good use.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud follows the progress of architectural designer Lincoln Miles and his wife, artist Lisa Traxler, who want to create their own home on the Isle of Wight. They have bought a property on a prime piece of land and set out to convert it into a creative structure that harmonises with the unspoilt woodland setting.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Sara Damergi helps teachers Paul Gardner and Paula McKee hunt for the perfect property near Murcia, Spain, after the soon-to-be-wed pair both secured jobs at the nearby international school. The couple have set aside a budget of £200,000 for the relocation.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Maggie and Ian Dickson, who run Glenferndale B&B near Edinburgh, hope to be in with a chance of winning the title of best establishment as another round of the competition gets under way. However, two guests feel things are too homely, a spelling mistake on the breakfast menu is spotted, and the mood is not helped when the hosts have a bust-up.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Kristin Grantham hosts at Pitlessie House near the historic town of St Andrews in Fife, where the owner's slipper policy raises some eyebrows and two guests are alarmed by a stained mattress in their room. The afternoon's bagpiping competition is a hit, but cultural differences flare up over dinner and the proprietor's continental breakfast does not achieve the score she hoped for.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Mother-and-daughter team Eileen and Jannika Hopeakoski invite guests to their B&B Sea-La-Vie in Southsea, Portsmouth, for the third visit of the week, and while the guests think the stylish rooms are a fine vintage, host Eileen gets hot under the collar after discovering Ian and Maggie have been trying to strip back the mattress cover.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Craig and Marie Harris welcome their guests to the Peaks Inn in Derbyshire, but a few of the guests are far from impressed upon arrival. When the hosts reveal ferret racing is their chosen activity, a joke causes Eileen to lose her temper, so Ian and Maggie decide to stage a silent protest.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The hoteliers meet one last time for feedback, during which they will discover how much their rivals thought their service was worth, and which of them was the most successful. Maggie and Ian Dickson decide to tackle complaints from Eileen and Jannika Hopeakoski head-on, while Craig and Marie Harris prepare for a fight after telling German competitor Kristin Grantham her venue and welcome lacked some much-needed warmth.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Retired teacher Theresa Robinson and her GP husband Alan are planning to relocate from Norfolk to Spain's Costa Brava. The couple have a budget of £250,000, and Sara Damergi takes them to view five potential homes.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Steve Cross has had a lifelong dream of living abroad and has finally met the love of his life, Sue, to share it with. With help from presenter Sara Damergi, they're determined to relocate to Aude in the south of France.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Kew Gardens, London: Looking for the White House.
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team visit the site of a forgotten palace built for George III at Kew Gardens in west London. The kitchen block is the only visible evidence that remains, so the immaculate lawns are ripped up in a search for the foundations.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team discover an unusual stone-covered grave as they race against the clock to excavate a Bronze Age cemetery in Fife, before land developers start work on the area.(n)

programme.title: Car SOS
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend travel to Essex, where they rescue a 1974 Chevrolet Corvette Stingray that has been off the road for years. However, they soon discover it may be a bigger job than they anticipated when they get the iconic US vehicle back to the workshop.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: The odds are stacked against Noel Fitzpatrick and his team as a golden retriever puppy with horrific facial injuries is brought into the practice after being attacked by another dog. Plus, a man drives all the way from Switzerland in the hope of a successful treatment for a Chihuahua, and a woman brings in her Hungarian vizsla, which has a bone and cartilage disorder.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: A Staffordshire bull terrier puppy called Rex receives treatment for a badly deformed elbow, and the team carry out a complicated procedure to realign the bones. Meanwhile, a cross-breed called Piggy with spinal problems leaves its family facing a difficult decision, and Noel devises an unorthodox cure for a stray cat with a badly fractured leg.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud follows the progress of Simon and Jill Bennett as they try to restore two timber-framed barns in Suffolk. The couple found out that one of the buildings is among the smallest surviving medieval guildhalls in the country, and while Kevin advises them to conserve it in its present state, Simon is determined to restore it to its former glory.(n)

programme.title: Dicte - Crime Reporter
programme.desc: New series. Part one of two. The reporter is contacted by her estranged father, who wants to tell her something important, and they arrange to meet. When a young woman is found murdered in a nearby hotel room, Dicte and Wagner's investigation into her fate leads them to the prostitution business controlled by wealthy Carl Ferdinand Poulsen. All the evidence points towards an extensive human trafficking ring, but can a mysterious woman named Grace lead the pair to the killer? Meanwhile, Dicte and Bo meet Rose's new boyfriend. Crime drama, starring Iben Hjejle, Lars Brygmann, Laerke Winther, Lars Ranthe, Dar Salim and Emilie Claudius Kruse. In Danish.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Patients arriving at King's College Hospital in London include 26-year-old Nicholas, whose jaw has been fractured and dislocated in an unprovoked attack, and Tyrell, 17, who needs to have a blackened toenail removed following a football injury. Meanwhile, Ho has brought his grandmother Amoui to the ward after finding her collapsed in her flat.(n)

programme.title: Lockdown
programme.desc: Chaos Control. Forget Midwestern hospitality at the St Louis County Jail. Built in 1998 and rededicated in 2004, this downtown facility processes over 30,000 arrestees each year. From drunk drivers and drug dealers to petty thieves and killers, they all pass through this municipal high-rise on their way to facing a judge(n)

programme.title: Lockdown
programme.desc: Gang vs. Family. In Utah, a homegrown gang battles larger national gangs for turf. But this gang is different - their loyalty is so extreme that membership passes from generation to generation and members put the gang first - no matter what cost(n)

programme.title: Lockdown
programme.desc: Kids Behind Bars. A look at Colorado's Youthful Offender System (YOS), where violent juvenile felons are given a chance at rehabilitation before they're sent to adult prisons. As with similar training programmes, the new group of recruits will endure very hard times, but this is not a typical boot camp. Rather than patriotic men and women ready to serve their country, they are underage, violent felons who are anything but eager to be here. From first-time convicts to young, street-savvy veterans, this group walks the thin line between delinquency and prison(n)

programme.title: Lockdown

programme.title: Explorer
programme.desc: Inside North Korea. Worldly minded viewers looking to explore what life is truly like under the oppressive regime of Kim Jong Il can finally find the answers to many of their lingering questions as reporter Lisa Ling infiltrates North Korea to offer an insider's perspective on this reclusive northeast Asian country. Armed with little more than a camera, a microphone, and a pressing determination to gain a better understanding of life in and around Pyongyang, Ling poses as a medical coordinator in order to document the tireless efforts of humanitarians during her closely-guarded journey. This is the North Korea that few Americans will ever see, a vast and beautiful landscape ruled by one of the most controversial dictatorships in modern history(n)

programme.title: The Invaders
programme.desc: Pigzilla. Australia is being over-run by an invader. At as many as twenty-three million strong, feral pigs have already caused untold damage, and further destruction is inevitable if they're not stopped. Highly intelligent, hardy, and adaptable feral pigs are thriving in the land down-under. Here, they're endangering native species, spreading disease, destroying farmland, and even attacking people. Deliberately introduced by humans centuries ago, now it's up to humans to keep their populations in check. But that's easier said than done. So scientists and citizens are now resorting to a range of methods to defend their country. Join Nat Geo WILD as we tag along with the people who are defending Australia from this dangerous invader(n)

programme.title: Hogzilla
programme.desc: A documentary on a feral hog killed by hunting guide Chris Griffin that was purported to weigh 1000 pounds. Featured: "Hogzilla" is exhumed by a team of experts(n)

programme.title: Monster Croc Hunt
programme.desc: For two years, a monster crocodile terrorizes a small Filipino community. It starts in 2009, with an attack on two young school girls - in which the crocodile decapitates 11-year-old Rowena Ruiz. More attacks on fishermen and livestock follow until September 2011, when Filipino croc legend Ronnie Sumiller succeeds in catching the killer alive. Called Lolong, the beast that they pull from the swamp is more massive than anything they've ever seen. Crocodile biologist Adam Britton arrives to measure it and officially certifies it as the Guinness Book of Records' largest known crocodile in the world. But there is dissent among the villagers - they're certain Lolong is the wrong croc, and that an even bigger monster is still out there(n)

programme.title: Mystery Bear of the Arctic

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: I, Stank Horse. In a situation straight out of I Love Lucy, Carlton (Alfonso Ribeiro) "adopts" a race horse that was headed for the glue factory--then tries to hide the fact when he brings the nag home. Meanwhile, aspiring model Ashley (Tatyana M. Ali) is offered a TV commercial that might lead to her being chosen for a top New York drama school. Philip (James Avery) is none too happy about this turn of events, feeling that the commercial is degrading and that his darling daughter will end up humiliated--but at this point, it seems he has nothing to say in the matter (a TV first!)(n)

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Oscar-nominated animated comedy adventure about a group of prehistoric animals who brave the elements to return a human baby to its father. Sid (John Leguizamo), a goofy and talkative sloth, wakes up to find that everyone's started to migrate south to avoid the onset of the Ice Age. Afraid of being deserted, he tags along with Manfred (Ray Romano), an embittered mammoth who's decided he'd rather head north. After stumbling across a human camp that's under attack by a pride of sabre-toothed tigers and narrowly saving a baby, they're joined by Diego, a sabretooth who convinces them he can help return the child by tracking the humans. However, he's actually a member of the same pride - and is plotting to guide them into an ambush. Can Manny and Sid find the baby's father and avoid the frozen weather? Or will Diego's plan mean they never make it? Also featuring the voice of Jack Black(n)

programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Elly and Mark enjoy a great day together, and it is clear that they have a developing chemistry. Xanthe suffers another setback, while David faces a moral dilemma.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Justin, Scarlett and Mason search frantically for Brody, while Marilyn is frustrated that John seems to be avoiding her. Roo comes to a decision about the daughter she gave away.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is furious when the university forces him to work with Kripke, while Howard's hobby lands him in financial trouble. However, that doesn't stop him and Raj getting expensive action figures of themselves made - much to Bernadette's disapproval.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: Six new cooks take on two challenges. The first three begin with a Skills Test set by Marcus Wareing. They have 15 minutes to make a Buck Rarebit - a Welsh Rarebit with a fried egg on top. The remaining three contestants must complete a Skills Test set by Monica Galetti, who examines their butchery skills by asking them to joint a whole rabbit and prepare it for cooking. In the final challenge the six chefs cook their own Signature Dish, before the best three are put through to the quarter finals.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
programme.desc: In a future ravaged by war, the superhero team makes a desperate last stand against a force of deadly robots. Their only hope is to send Wolverine back in time to the 1970s, to join forces with an earlier version of the X-Men and change the events that started the conflict. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Hugh Jackman, Jennifer Lawrence, James McAvoy and Michael Fassbender.(n)

programme.title: Other Voices
programme.desc: The show celebrating rising musical talent draws to a close with performances by Norwegian musician Ane Brun, Limerick-based outfit Bleeding Heart Pigeons and Leicester-born singer-songwriter Mahalia. Plus, multi-instrumentalist Gavin Glass from Stillorgan, Dublin, takes up residence in the IMRO Other Room.(n)

programme.title: Bad Education
programme.desc: Alfie has to go back to school to pass his Biology GCSE, which is taught by Miss Gulliver, and decides that his only way of passing the exam is to cheat. However, he comes up against the notoriously tough invigilator Mr Hewston - and a battle of wills ensues. Elsewhere, Martin babysits his girlfriend's dog, and Fraser organises and end of term exam skip party.(n)

programme.title: Father Figure
programme.desc: Tom decides to hide all the family's gadgets and enforce some good old-fashioned fun, but his decision proves unpopular with everyone and his sons struggle to adapt to a world without computer games. Pat and Mary, meanwhile, find alternative ways to pass the time and it looks as though Tom might be winning through - until he discovers what has happened to his own belongings. Comedy, starring Jason Byrne.(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: When Caroline's grandmother wakes from a four-year coma with no knowledge of the financial scandal that engulfed her family, Caroline tries to hide the truth from her.(n)

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: Part one of two. A dramatic wild fire spreads at a rapid pace just outside San Antonio, and a rescue mission mounted by Scott and Jordan places them both in mortal peril.(n)

programme.title: EuroNews
programme.desc: European and international headlines live via satellite.(n)

programme.title: Wild Kratts

programme.title: Kiva Can Do
programme.desc: Animation about a five-year-old girl who knows how to make her own fun and whose imagination knows no bounds.(n)

programme.sub-title: Golf: Dubai Duty Free Irish Open: 2017 Day Two.
programme.desc: Joanne Cantwell is joined by John McHenry to present live coverage of day two of the European Tour event, held this year at Portstewart Golf Club in Londonderry, Northern Ireland. The Scottish duo of Russell Knox and Marc Warren shot the joint-best round of day two 12 months ago with six-under-par 66s, but home star Rory McIlroy went on to take the title. With commentary by Shane O'Donoghue.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: David lies to his boss to cover his tracks, but Paul is annoyed to learn that Leo has put David's career in jeopardy. Aaron starts to waver on a business deal with Mishti.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away

programme.title: Atlantic: The Wildest Ocean on Earth
programme.desc: Cillian Murphy narrates a documentary examining the lives of animals and people pitting themselves against the world's wildest ocean, unveiling the natural forces that underpin life in the Atlantic, from the world's most powerful currents, ferocious hurricanes and huge chains of undersea volcanoes. The first episode looks at the influence of the Gulf Stream, with whales, giant turtles and jellyfish riding the huge current that becomes a migration super-highway and helps warm northern Europe, while fishermen battle for survival in mountainous seas as they try to exploit its natural fertility.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals

programme.title: Liar Liar

programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. programme.title: Trail of the Pink Panther
programme.desc: An intrepid reporter investigates the mysterious disappearance of the bumbling Inspector Clouseau. Comedy sequel made after star Peter Sellers' death, using out-takes and unused footage from previous Pink Panther films, with Joanna Lumley, David Niven, Herbert Lom and Burt Kwouk.(n)

programme.title: Spud 2: The Madness Continues
programme.desc: A teenager's trials and tribulations continue as he tries to negotiate his second year at boarding school. Comedy-drama, starring Troye Sivan, John Cleese and Sven Ruygrok.(n)

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: A lazy twentysomething lives off his wealthy hotel magnate father. When the old man decides to retire, he begins to question whether his layabout son is suitable to take over the family empire and issues a challenge - he must retake 12 years of school in 24 weeks, or lose everything. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Bridgette Wilson, Darren McGavin and Bradley Whitford.(n)

Southern California is plunged into panic following the attack on Pearl Harbor. A group of American soldiers and a renegade air force pilot are caught up in the mayhem, unaware that a lost Japanese submarine crew are actually planning an attack - if they can find their way to Hollywood. Steven Spielberg's comedy, starring Dan Aykroyd, John Belushi and Christopher Lee.(n)

programme.title: When Harry Met Sally
programme.desc: A man and a woman with different attitudes to life meet by chance and develop a close and long-lasting friendship. But over time, a mutual sexual attraction begins to develop and threatens to ruin their relationship - raising the question whether men and women can ever really be just friends. Romantic comedy, starring Billy Crystal and Meg Ryan.(n)

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: A mild-mannered man hopes for his wife's two children to view him as their father. His dreams of perfect family life are threatened by the return of their biological father, a charismatic, motorcycle-riding tough guy, and he pulls out all the stops to prove to his stepchildren that he can be just as cool. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg.(n)

programme.title: The Tiger Hunter
programme.desc: A young Indian man moves to 1970s Chicago in the hope of impressing his childhood crush and living up to the legacy of his father, but not everything goes to plan. Comedy, starring Danny Pudi, Rizwan Manji and Jon Heder.(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Teenager Marty McFly travels back to the 1950s in a time machine built by his eccentric inventor friend. The return journey proves tricky enough, but he also accidentally alters the sequence of events that led to his parents falling in love - and has to persuade his future dad to win his mother's heart, or he will never be born. Sci-fi comedy adventure, starring Michael J Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson and Crispin Glover.(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: The struggling owner of a run-down gym is forced to take drastic action to prevent an arrogant fitness guru buying the business out from under him - and enlists his customers to form a dodgeball team in the hope of triumphing in the US championships. Sporting comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Vince Vaughn and Christine Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: A mild-mannered man hopes for his wife's two children to view him as their father. His dreams of perfect family life are threatened by the return of their biological father, a charismatic, motorcycle-riding tough guy, and he pulls out all the stops to prove to his stepchildren that he can be just as cool. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg.(n)

programme.title: Stakeout
programme.desc: A detective leads the hunt for an escaped murderer. However, the case takes a complicated turn when he falls in love with the killer's former girlfriend while maintaining a surveillance operation on her - much to the disapproval of his jittery partner. Comedy thriller, starring Richard Dreyfuss, Emilio Estevez, Aidan Quinn, Dan Lauria and Madeleine Stowe.(n)

programme.title: Bruno
programme.desc: A gay Austrian fashion journalist becomes a figure of hate in his own country, and heads to America in search of celebrity with his adoring assistant in tow. He embarks on a campaign of publicity stunts to make himself famous, encountering prejudice and meeting people similarly desperate for stardom. Spoof documentary, starring Sacha Baron Cohen and Gustaf Hammarsten.(n)

programme.title: Top Secret
programme.desc: A rock 'n' roll singer goes on tour in East Germany in the 1950s, where a scientist's daughter draws him into the world of international espionage through a French underground movement seeking to foil a Nazi plan to take over the world. Comedy, spoofing Second World War spy thrillers and Elvis movies, starring Val Kilmer, Lucy Gutteridge and Omar Sharif.(n)

programme.title: The Pink Panther
programme.desc: The world's most inept police detective, Inspector Clouseau, heads off to Switzerland in search of a suave jewel thief who has purloined a priceless diamond from a princess - but the bumbling officer's every ruse to foil the crime ends in chaos, not least when he is framed for the robbery himself. Blake Edwards' comedy, starring Peter Sellers, David Niven, Capucine, Robert Wagner and Claudia Cardinale.(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming: Special
programme.desc: The making of the new Marvel superhero movie, which sees Tom Holland as the friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man, taking on Michael Keaton's Vulture with the help of Iron Man.(n)

programme.title: Spud 3: Learning to Fly
programme.desc: Comedy drama charting the trials and tribulations of an awkward teenager entering his third year at boarding school. Starring Troye Sivan and John Cleese.(n)

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A hard-working businessman gets his hands on a remote control that enables him to manipulate all aspects of his life - including fast-forwarding through the bits he would rather miss. However, the device takes on a mind of its own and starts causing him to skip entire years. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Christopher Walken and Kate Beckinsale.(n)

programme.title: Hot Pursuit
programme.desc: An uptight, accident prone police officer desperate to prove herself has to protect a gangster's widow who has agreed to give evidence against a drug lord. They end up forced to go on the run together, and are pursued across Texas by hitmen and corrupt cops. Crime comedy, starring Reese Witherspoon and Sofia Vergara.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A retiree grows tired of the quiet life and becomes an intern at a start-up run by a beautiful entrepreneur, and teaches the young staff a few things about successful business. Comedy, starring Robert De Niro, Anne Hathaway and Rene Russo.(n)

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Calamity ensues when two party-loving brothers attempt to find respectable dates for their sister's Hawaii wedding. Comedy, starring Zac Efron and Anna Kendrick.(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: Fast-talking Detroit cop Axel Foley heads for Los Angeles after an old friend is murdered before his eyes. His search for the killers leads him into conflict with a seemingly untouchable drug kingpin, but he also has to contend with the local force, who do not want him taking matters into his own hands. Comedy thriller, starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Ronny Cox, John Ashton and Steven Berkoff.(n)

programme.title: Dirty 30
programme.desc: Four friends stuck in a rut decide to celebrate one of their birthdays in style, but it isn't long before things spiral out of control. Comedy, starring Grace Helbig, Mamrie Hart and Hannah Hart.(n)

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A retiree grows tired of the quiet life and becomes an intern at a start-up run by a beautiful entrepreneur, and teaches the young staff a few things about successful business. Comedy, starring Robert De Niro, Anne Hathaway and Rene Russo.(n)

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Calamity ensues when two party-loving brothers attempt to find respectable dates for their sister's Hawaii wedding. Comedy, starring Zac Efron and Anna Kendrick.(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: Fast-talking Detroit cop Axel Foley heads for Los Angeles after an old friend is murdered before his eyes. His search for the killers leads him into conflict with a seemingly untouchable drug kingpin, but he also has to contend with the local force, who do not want him taking matters into his own hands. Comedy thriller, starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Ronny Cox, John Ashton and Steven Berkoff.(n)

programme.title: Aladdin and the King of Thieves
programme.desc: The Arabian adventurer prepares to marry his beloved Jasmine, but gets distracted by a gang of robbers who have stolen a powerful magical artefact, as well as the news that his long-lost father is still alive. Animated adventure sequel, with the voice of Robin Williams, Scott Weinger, Linda Larkin and John Rhys-Davies.(n)

programme.title: The Incredible Journey
programme.desc: The owners of a cat and two dogs leave their pets with a friend in a remote area of Canada while they take a holiday abroad. When the minder embarks on a hunting trip, the three animals find themselves unattended and set out on a hazardous journey through the wilderness to get back home. Disney adventure, starring Emile Genest and John Drainie.(n)

programme.title: Peter Pan
programme.desc: Three children are visited in the night by a magical flying boy and a fairy named Tinker Bell. The strange youngster takes them away to his home, the magical island of Neverland, where his band of runaway youngsters are engaged in an ongoing battle with a crew of pirates. Disney animated adventure based on JM Barrie's novel, with the voices of Bobby Driscoll and Hans Conried.(n)

programme.title: Eight Below
programme.desc: An Antarctic scientific expedition has to be aborted when a blizzard hits, forcing their guide to leave behind his team of huskies in the frozen wilderness. He is determined to return and rescue the animals, but in the meantime, the dogs have to rely on pack instinct alone to ensure their survival in the hostile climate. Disney adventure, starring Paul Walker, Bruce Greenwood and Jason Biggs.(n)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: A lion prince blames himself for his father's death and flees into the wilderness, leaving his wicked uncle to take over. As the cub grows to adulthood, he receives a vision of the dead king, who inspires him to seek revenge and reclaim his rightful throne. Disney animated musical, featuring the voices of Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, Rowan Atkinson, Whoopi Goldberg and James Earl Jones.(n)

programme.title: Monsters, Inc
programme.desc: Two monsters work for an energy firm that employs scary creatures to sneak into children's bedrooms and convert their screams into power. However, when a little girl accidentally wanders into the pair's domain, they have to race against time to return her safely home before anyone finds out. Pixar animated comedy, with the voices of John Goodman, Billy Crystal, Steve Buscemi and James Coburn.(n)

programme.title: The Fox and the Hound
programme.desc: An orphaned fox cub is taken in by a kindly widow, and becomes firm friends with a puppy belonging to a hunter. However, as they grow to adulthood, the dog is trained to prey on foxes, and the two animals realise their friendship may not survive as they are expected to be natural enemies. Animated adventure, with the voices of Mickey Rooney and Kurt Russell.(n)

programme.title: Peter Pan
programme.desc: Three children are visited in the night by a magical flying boy and a fairy named Tinker Bell. The strange youngster takes them away to his home, the magical island of Neverland, where his band of runaway youngsters are engaged in an ongoing battle with a crew of pirates. Disney animated adventure based on JM Barrie's novel, with the voices of Bobby Driscoll and Hans Conried.(n)

Disney animated musical, featuring the voices of Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, Rowan Atkinson, Whoopi Goldberg and James Earl Jones.(n)

He is determined to return and rescue the animals, but in the meantime, the dogs have to rely on pack instinct alone to ensure their survival in the hostile climate.
